doc.field: Shr 48 cts vs four cts Net 882,000 vs 82,000 Sales 968,000 vs 784,000 Six mths Shr 53 cts vs 11 cts Net 970,000 vs 202,000 Sales 2,001,000 vs 1,521,000 NOTE: 1986 net includes a gain of 26 cts a share from the sale of a funeral home, and tax credits of 20 cts. 1985 net includes tax credits of one cent in the quarter and 3.7 cts in the six months period. Reuter
